channel.title: Walk The Plank
channel.description: podcast with hints on pirating movies, music and software...and just some damn good tunes to boot!
channel.itunes:subtitle: If you dont like free Sh** get the F*** out!
channel.itunes:author: taintedheir
channel.itunes:summary: podcast with hints on pirating movies, music and software...and just some damn good tunes to boot!

item.title: Episode 11 "Worst Show In History!!"

item.title: Episode 9 Pirates In Heat!
item.description: In case i run out of bandwith for the month...here is a backup link http://openflv.com/WTP_temp/2007-06-17T21_54_25-07_00.mp3 special guest host WyckedDreamz http://stage6.divx.com/Space--Above-and-Beyond http://stage6.divx.com/Dungeons-and-Dragons--Animated http://stage6.divx.com/Planet-of-the-Apes http://stage6.divx.com/V-the-series http://stage6.divx.com/Buck-Rogers-in-the-25th-Century and a great free dvd ripper program http://www.fairusewizard.com/lang_en/fairuse_wizard_dvd_divx_xvid_backup_tool_light_edition.html We discuss the DMCA and how new laws are effecting pirates more every day http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DMCA http://www.anti-dmca.org/ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_Copyright_Infringement_Liability_Limitation_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NET_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copyright_Term_Extension_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_Transition_Content_Security_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary_of_legal_terms_in_technology http://thomas.loc.gov/cgi-bin/bdquery/z?d108:s.02237: <<< The PIRATE Act
item.dc:creator: taintedheir
item.itunes:summary:
In case i run out of bandwith for the month...here is a backup link http://openflv.com/WTP_temp/2007-06-17T21_54_25-07_00.mp3
special guest host WyckedDreamz
http://stage6.divx.com/Space--Above-and-Beyond http://stage6.divx.com/Dungeons-and-Dragons--Animated http://stage6.divx.com/Planet-of-the-Apes http://stage6.divx.com/V-the-series http://stage6.divx.com/Buck-Rogers-in-the-25th-Century
and a great free dvd ripper program http://www.fairusewizard.com/lang_en/fairuse_wizard_dvd_divx_xvid_backup_tool_light_edition.html
We discuss the DMCA and how new laws are effecting pirates more every day http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DMCA http://www.anti-dmca.org/ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_Copyright_Infringement_Liability_Limitation_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NET_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copyright_Term_Extension_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_Transition_Content_Security_Act http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary_of_legal_terms_in_technology http://thomas.loc.gov/cgi-bin/bdquery/z?d108:s.02237: <<< The PIRATE Act
